Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Skin-RF (Character Model and Texture Replacement)
Mod.Author: Dulca + Slimebucket
Mod.Description: New weapons, and Cloudie McDoom costume! Skin-RF is a graphical upgrade for battle and field models for playable characters and soon NPCs and Field objects too. You'll find a variety of costumes to use in and out of combat. You can customize your team to your liking even more with options for weapons.

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.31 - minor fixes Version 1.30 - Cloudie McDoom costume for Squall added Version 1.20 - Slimebucket weapons for Squall added Version 1.10 - minor fixes Version 1.00 - First Release!
